author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...PRISCILLA BECOMES A HURRICANE... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND GUSTY WINDS CONTINUE FOR COASTAL SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO...
summary: ...PRISCILLA BECOMES A HURRICANE... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND GUSTY WINDS CONTINUE FOR COASTAL SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 2:00 PM MST Sun Oct 05 the center of Priscilla was located near 16.4, -107.1 with movement NNW at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 986 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Priscilla (EP1/EP162025)
